title: Hand Simulator
notes: Fonts missing from WINE, main menu completely black. Needs winetricks (corefonts and tahoma tested, one or the other fixed this). In main branch, I can't see my hands), but graphics and sounds and menus work. Waiting for the devel update, just opted in.

title: Hand Simulator
notes: Runs for a second and then nothing

Run decently after installing corefonts by using winetricks (fixes invisible menu) and using Steam launch option "-force-d3d9" to force DX9 (fixes invisible hands, performance etc)
Tested with Proton 3.7-6 and 3.7-7 (Beta)
title: Hand Simulator
